'WHEN I GROW UP MY DESK WILL STILL FIT ME!'

The kids' room needs to be the right place for many occassions. It's the place wherekids have fun, hang out or play videogames - alone, with siblings or friends. Andsometimes it also needs to be the perfect place to study. Therefore, kids' furnitureshould endure a lot and bring them pleasure over many years.

The NISTAC designers and developers work with great attention to detail on our desk series for pupils. The desks, for example, not only grow at the same pace as the kidsbetween 6 and 18.they also offer small special features in addition to the importantergonomic features, which make a good desk organisation easy. And since order is halthe life, there is enough time for playing, fun and also for homework.
